required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate Clinical Characteristics of Lung Cancer in Patients With Surgeries and Adjuvant Therapies
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-centre Real-world Non-interventional Observational Study to Evaluate Clinical Characteristics of the Chinese Patients With Lung Malignant Tumors Who Received Surgeries or Surgeries Plus Adjuvant Therapies

brief_summary.textblock: The study was designed to evaluate effectiveness of the surgeries and adjuvant therapies after surgeries in the patients with lung malignant tumors

detailed_description.textblock: The trial is a multi-centre real-world non-interventional observational study to evaluate effectiveness of the surgeries and adjuvant therapies after surgeries in the patients with lung malignant tumors via a retrospectively review method on the study data on patient demographic/tumor biological characteristics and clinical treatments.

primary_outcome.measure: Demographic characteristics of the patients with lung malignant tumors who received surgeries
primary_outcome.description: Demographic characteristics of the patients with lung malignant tumors who received surgeries of thoracotomy, video-assistant thoracic surgery or robotic thoracic surgery as measured by: Age Gender Payment types Insurance types Smoking history Complications and symptoms of complications Respiratory functions Type of diagnoses

secondary_outcome.measure: Location of tumors and tumor sizes
secondary_outcome.description: Location of tumors and tumor sizes

other_outcome.measure: Differences in overall survivals of the patients with surgeries
other_outcome.description: Differences in perioperative overall survivals and overall survivals of the patients who received surgeries of thoracotomy, video-assistant thoracic surgery or robotic thoracic surgery

other_outcome.measure: Impact factors of patient survival in patients with tumor size =<2 cm who received surgeries as measured by tumor clinical/pathological staging
other_outcome.description: Impact factors of patient survival in patients with tumor size =<2 cm who received surgeries as measured by tumor clinical/pathological staging

other_outcome.measure: Impact factors of patient survival in patients with tumor size =<2 cm who received surgeries as measured by location of tumors and tumor sizes
other_outcome.description: Impact factors of patient survival in patients with tumor size =<2 cm who received surgeries as measured by location of tumors and tumor sizes

other_outcome.measure: Impact factors of patient survival in patients with tumor size =<2 cm who received surgeries as measured by duration and modes of surgeries
other_outcome.description: Impact factors of patient survival in patients with tumor size =<2 cm who received surgeries as measured by duration and modes of surgeries

other_outcome.measure: Impact factors of patient survival in patients with tumor size =<2 cm who received surgeries as measured by type of insurances
other_outcome.description: Impact factors of patient survival in patients with tumor size =<2 cm who received surgeries as measured by type of insurances

other_outcome.measure: Overall survival in the patients with tumor size =< 2cm who received surgeries
other_outcome.description: Overall survival in the patients with tumor size =< 2cm who received surgeries

other_outcome.measure: Impact factors of patient survivals in the patients with N2 lung cancer with surgeries or surgeries plus adjuvant therapies
other_outcome.description: Impact factors of patient survivals in the patients with N2 lung cancer who received surgeries or surgeries plus adjuvant therapies

other_outcome.measure: Overall survival in the patients with N2 lung cancer with surgeries or surgeries plus adjuvant therapies
other_outcome.description: Overall survival in the patients with N2 lung cancer who received surgeries or surgeries plus adjuvant therapies

other_outcome.measure: Impact factors of patient survivals in the patients with small lung cancer with surgeries or surgeries plus adjuvant therapies
other_outcome.description: Impact factors of patient survivals in the patients with small lung cancer who received surgeries or surgeries plus adjuvant therapies

other_outcome.measure: Overall survival in the patients with small lung cancer with surgeries or surgeries plus adjuvant therapies
other_outcome.description: Overall survival in the patients with small lung cancer who received surgeries or surgeries plus adjuvant therapies

other_outcome.measure: Demographic characteristics of the patients with non-small cell lung cancer who were treated with chemotherapies, tyrosine kinase inhibitors, and other adjuvant therapies or were not treated with adjuvant therapies
other_outcome.description: Demographic characteristics of the patients with non-small cell lung cancer who were treated with chemotherapies, tyrosine kinase inhibitors, and other adjuvant therapies or were not treated with adjuvant therapies as measured by: Age Gender Payment types Insurance types Smoking history Complications and symptoms of complications Respiratory functions Type of diagnoses

arm_group.description: Surgeries or surgeries plus adjuvant therapies

intervention.description: Surgeries or surgeries plus adjuvant therapies

study_pop.textblock: Patients with lung malignant tumors who were performed with surgeries

facility.name: Tongji Hospital Affiliated to Huaxi Technology University
